.elementor-10783 .elementor-element.elementor-element-3b3ba9b > .elementor-element-populated{padding:0px 0px 0px 0px;}.elementor-10783 .elementor-element.elementor-element-4e4ea613 .one-block-whole-link{z-index:1;}.elementor-10783 .elementor-element.elementor-element-4e4ea613 .module-card__content{min-height:620px;text-align:left;padding:0% 40% 0% 20%;}.elementor-10783 .elementor-element.elementor-element-4e4ea613 .module-card__title{font-size:40px;font-weight:700;text-transform:uppercase;line-height:58px;letter-spacing:0px;}.elementor-10783 .elementor-element.elementor-element-4e4ea613 .module-card__title:not(:last-child){margin-bottom:15px;}.elementor-10783 .elementor-element.elementor-element-4e4ea613 .module-card__description{font-size:17px;font-weight:400;line-height:27px;letter-spacing:0px;}.elementor-10783 .elementor-element.elementor-element-4e4ea613 .module-card__description:not(:last-child){margin-bottom:50px;}.elementor-10783 .elementor-element.elementor-element-4e4ea613
